name: Dodgeball
description: Throw your ball at a player, or hold it to block incoming balls; or if you're really brave try to catch a ball and get your teammates to spawn back in. Get your friends together and host a game for some fast-paced competitive fun.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-Bit or better Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
